Ad Text:
Reporting to:

This role reports directly to the Chief Technology Officer (CTO)

Tasks and Responsibilities:

Analyze business processes, procedures, and work practices to identify opportunities for improvement and automation.

Collaborate with stakeholders to define, document, and prioritize business requirements for ML solutions.

Conduct feasibility studies and cost-benefit analyses for proposed ML solutions.

Develop and maintain functional specifications and system design documents for ML projects.

Facilitate communication between technical teams and business stakeholders to ensure ML solutions meet business needs.

Work with the data science team to define and document data requirements for ML projects.

Assist in the development of user acceptance testing plans and coordinate user acceptance testing for ML solutions.

Develop and maintain user manuals, training materials, and other documentation for ML solutions.

Monitor and report on the progress of ML projects, identifying and mitigating risks and issues.

Continuously evaluate implemented ML solutions to identify areas for improvement and make recommendations for enhancements.

Qualifications, education, experience and abilities required:

Qualifications requirements:

A relevant Bachelor's degree

Experience requirements:

A minimum of 3 years of relevant experience

Abilities/Attributes

Demonstrate proficiency in written communication, adept at conveying complex information and delivering actionable recommendations.

Possess excellent problem-solving abilities.

Capable of working with data-intensive applications, designing durable data pipelines, and developing machine learning models.

Exhibit outstanding interpersonal skills and thrive in a team-oriented environment.

Excel in time management, adept at multitasking to meet deadlines effectively.

Show dedication to the company by upholding integrity and professionalism, recognizing the significance of maintaining strong client relationships.

Position is full-time (38 hours per week), Monday to Friday

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Schedule:




8 hour shift




Ability to commute/relocate:




Surry Hills, NSW 2010: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)




Experience:




Data Science: 3 years (Required)




Work Location: In person
